about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn more about our team and mission
about.description:
The Finance Scouts Team is a student organization affiliated with the Department of Finance and Banking at the College of Business Administration, Imam Abdulrahman Bin Faisal University. The team seeks to promote financial literacy among students, support innovation and financial knowledge, and build an effective bridge between academia and the professional sector.

The team was established under the supervision of the Head of the Department, Dr. Dina Qabouri, and includes a distinguished group of male and female students interested in the financial field within a specialized organizational structure. The team was officially launched on April 30, 2024, in the presence of the Dean of the College, Dr. Faisal Al-Hadithi. It aims to contribute to the development of the financial sector in alignment with Saudi Vision 2030.

affiliation.title: University Affiliation
affiliation.description: We operate under the supervision of the College of Economics and Administration, in collaboration with professors and industry professionals to deliver high-quality educational experiences.

items.title: Empowered Generation
items.description: Preparing a generation of students capable of facing the challenges of the financial and banking job market.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.subtitle: Where We Are Headed
vision.statement:
To build a generation of finance and banking students who possess financial awareness and the ability to manage their resources efficiently and responsibly, contributing effectively to the development of the financial sector.

We work to empower students to become leaders and innovators in the financial field, driven by our belief that Saudi youth are a powerful force for change. Through supporting innovation and entrepreneurship in alignment with the objectives of Saudi Vision 2030, we strive to create a sustainable impact in the world of finance and business.
vision.mission:
Qualifying finance and banking students by investing in their skills and building their professional and financial futures with competence and awareness, in alignment with the objectives of Saudi Vision 2030.

We aim to guide students in understanding labor market transformations and exploring high-quality opportunities in the financial and banking sector, while strengthening financial awareness and professional analysis. Through innovative programs and events, we are committed to supporting them in making sound and sustainable financial decisions and creating a meaningful impact in their academic and professional journeys.
